title: Channel Islands National Park: Bald Eagle Media
body: Bald Eagle Media              Return Flight: Restoring the Bald Eagle to the Channel Islands   Loading the player...       Visit JWPlayer docs for keyboard shortcuts  Duration:13 minutes, 46 seconds  Return Flight: Restoring the Bald Eagle to the Channel IslandsThis 13-minute film chronicles the journey of the bald eagle's recovery from disappearance on the Channel Islands in the 1960s due to DDT contamination, overhunting, and egg collecting to today's population of about 60 eagles on four Channel Islands, some that are successfully breeding.                Bald Eagle Restoration on the Channel Islands   Loading the player...       Visit JWPlayer docs for keyboard shortcuts  Duration:1 minute, 49 seconds  Bald Eagle Restoration on the Channel IslandsThis short video gives an overview of bald eagle restoration efforts on the Channel Islands.                      Bald Eagles Photos   22 Photos  Bald eagle photos from the Channel Islands.                              2010 Bald Eagle Highlights: Chick Feeding   Loading the player...    Transcript No audio. Only video. Close Transcript     Visit JWPlayer docs for keyboard shortcuts  Duration:11 minutes, 38 seconds  2010 Bald Eagle Highlights: Chick Feeding          2006 Channel Islands Live Bald Eagle Webcam Highlights  Northside Bald Eagle Chick Feeding at Different Stages of Development   April 2006    May 2006  July 2006    Southside Bald Eagle Chick's First Flight  July 2006   These files require Windows Media Player.
